mapper.delete: delete from p_qlcBalance WHERE 1=1 AND createDate BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT oa.orderId,oa.serviceId,oa.reserveId,oa.priceName,oa.price,oa.orderMemo,oa.cardNo,oa.operator,oa.operatorName,oa.createDate,oa.channelId,oa.payUpdateKey,oa.orderState FROM( SELECT a.orderId,a.serviceId,a.orderId reserveId,a.priceName,a.price,a.orderMemo,a.cardNo,a.operatorId operator,a.operatorName, b.beginDate createDate,(CASE b.payState WHEN 2 THEN 1 END) orderState,a.channelId,b.transActionNo payUpdateKey FROM o_payOrder b LEFT JOIN o_order a on a.orderId = b.orderId WHERE b.payState='2' and b.beginDate BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT c.orderId,a.serviceId,a.orderId reserveId,a.priceName,c.refundPrice price,a.orderMemo,a.cardNo,a.operatorId operator,a.operatorName, c.beginDate createDate,(CASE c.payState WHEN 4 THEN 2 END ) orderState,a.channelId,c.refundNo payUpdateKey FROM o_refundorder c LEFT JOIN o_order a on a.orderId = c.orderId WHERE c.payState='4' AND c.beginDate BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) oa

SELECT p.orderId,q.serviceId,q.reserveId,q.priceName,CAST(p.transactions AS DECIMAL(10,2))*100 price,q.orderMemo,q.cardNo,q.operator, q.operatorName,p.transDate createDate,p.channelId,p.merchNo payUpdateKey,p.orderType orderState FROM p_bill p LEFT JOIN p_qlcBalance q ON p.orderId = q.orderId AND ((q.payUpdateKey = p.refundMerchNo and p.orderType='2' AND p.channelId = '100123') OR (q.payUpdateKey = p.merchNo AND p.channelId = '100123' AND p.orderType='1')) AND p.orderType = q.orderState WHERE p.transdate BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND q.orderId IS NULL

SELECT * from O_Order o WHERE 1=1
AND o.orderId = #{balance.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
